Благодаря свойству ориентации полимеров,: Thanks to the orientation property of polymers, 5Dtech technology increases Flexural and compressive strength. Get details:
До х4 раз прочнее, чем 3D: Up to x4 times stronger than 3D
Благодаря объемной, а не послойной уклад: 5Dtech technology reinforces the structure of the product thanks to volumetric, rather than layer-by-layer laying of threads. Use this advantage when printing with continuous fibers and create unprecedented strong quasi-isotropic products.
Благодаря многоосевой кинематике, технол: Thanks to multi-axis kinematics, 5Dtech technology allows you to either completely avoid or significantly reduce the support under the overhanging elements of the product, which increases production speed, reduces post-processing time and provides material savings of up to 70%.
За счет оптимизации путей перемещения (б: Due to the optimization of travel paths (longer filling areas where the printer has time to reach the set speed), the speed of 5D printing is up to 2 times higher than that of 3D printing.
В отличие от классической 3D печати, тех: Unlike classic 3D printing, 5Dtech technology can print on any surface. Use special equipment for mass production of products or a blank that will become part of the future product – now You can create composite parts with metal reinforcement.
Алгоритмы технологии 5Dtech обеспечивают: 5Dtech algorithms provide automatic preparation of parts for multi-axis printing, unlike industrial solutions that require complex manual CAM preparation of the control program. Printing is as easy as using a regular 3D printer.
Используйте привычные программы для CAD: Use the usual programs for CAD modeling. The STE Slicer software works with a common 3D printing format – STL, unlike industrial solutions that only work with proprietary CAD model formats when preparing for multi-axis printing.
5D принтер и программное обеспечение STE: The 5D printer and STE Slicer software allow you to work with multiple print modes and combine them. Use the Classic / Coiling /Directional /surface modes to solve any range of tasks.
